#summary get(any[functionName])
#labels api,0.9.1

*Category*:

[ConfigurationFunctions Configuration Functions]

*Description*:

Use to retrieve the value of a global setting.

*Return Type*:

Void

*History*:

-

*Parameters*:

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Required* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| _any_ || string || true || - || Name/value to set ||
|| *functionName* || string || false ||   || The name of the function when getting a default value for an argument ||
